Summary:
With his rumpled raincoat, ever-present cigar, bumbling demeanour and Sherlock Holmesian powers of deduction, disarmingly polite homicide detective Lieutenant Columbo took on some of the most cunning murderers in Los Angeles, most of whom made one fatal, irrevocable mistake: underestimating his investigative genius.

Description
Season 9, Episode 1
November 25, 1989
Murder: A Self Portrait
A renowned artist employs a masterly trompe l'oeil to cover the murder of his ex-wife on the beach---far from the studio where he was supposedly painting. Louise: Fionnula Flanagan. Vanessa: Shera Danese. Julie: Isabel Lorca. Columbo: Peter Falk.

Season 9, Episode 2
January 20, 1990
Columbo Cries Wolf
Columbo digs up the corpus delicti---but not the corpse---when a magazine publisher (Deidre Hall) disappears after deciding to sell out her lover-partner of 12 years. Sean Brantley: Ian Buchanan. Tina: Rebecca Staab. Sir Harry Matthews: Alan Scarfe.

Season 9, Episode 3
February 10, 1990
Agenda for Murder
A Vice Presidential candidate's crony murders a racketeer who could derail his express to the Cabinet. Oscar Finch: Patrick McGoohan. Paul Mackey: Denis Arndt. Mrs. Finch: Penny Fuller. Mrs. Staplin: Rita Taggart. Gov. James Montgomery: Arthur Hill. Columbo: Peter Falk.

Season 9, Episode 4
March 31, 1990
Rest in Peace, Mrs. Columbo
Mrs. Columbo is the victim of a pathological killer who holds three persons responsible for her husband's death in prison. Her next target: Lt. Columbo. Leland St. John: Ian McShane. Sgt. Brady: Tom Isbell. Priest: Hugh Gillin. Dede Perkins: Teresa Ganzel. Dr. Steadman: Roscoe Lee Browne.

Season 9, Episode 5
April 28, 1990
Uneasy Lies the Crown
Deadly lies the crown on the tooth of an actor who's cuckolding his dentist. Nancy Walker, Ron Cey and Dick Sargent have cameos. Columbo: Peter Falk. Dr. Wesley Corman: James Read. Lydia Corman: Jo Anderson. Dr. Horace Sherwin: Paul Burke. Adam Evans: Marshall Teague. David Sherwin: Mark Arnott. Sgt. McCulley: James A. Watson Jr.

Season 9, Episode 6
May 14, 1990
Murder in Malibu
An ambitious womanizer shoots the romance novelist who rejected him, and makes the murder look like robbery gone awry. Wayne Jennings: Andrew Stevens. Jess McCurdy: Brenda Vaccaro. Lt. Schultz: Floyd Levine. Theresa Goren: Janet Margolin. Mrs. Rocca: Sondra Currie. Helen: Ashcroft: Laurie Walters
